/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance. Cars are parked along the sides of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
